title: Sign Function
description:
SIGN_I returns TRUE if the input value is negative. The input
values are of type DINT.
name: SIGN_I

input.name: IN
input.description: A 32-bit signed integer input whose sign is to be checked.

return_value.description: A boolean value indicating the sign of the input integer. Returns true if the sign bit is set (input is negative), otherwise returns false.
